name: swarm

effect.black_white: Increases the frequency of cries heard on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.
effect.black_2_white_2: Increases the frequency of cries heard on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.

short_effect: Strengthens bug moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.

flavor_text.black_white: Powers up Bug-type moves in a pinch.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: Powers up Bug-type moves in a pinch.
